display_help: Slightly boosts your resistance to Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects for 120 seconds. Must be used before you are Slept, Held or Disoriented, but can be used after being Immobilized.
display_target_help: Slightly boosts your resistance to Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects for 120 seconds. Must be used before you are Slept, Held or Disoriented, but can be used after being Immobilized.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} protects you from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, and Hold effects.
